0.text: Innate: Upon reaching levels 1, 6, 11, and 16, along with spending a skill point, Kayle ascends into a new form, gaining additional bonuses.

1.text: Level 1 - Zealous: Kayle  on-attack gains  6% (+ 1% per 100 AP) bonus attack speed for 5 seconds, stacking up to 5 times for a maximum of  30% (+ 5% per 100 AP). At maximum stacks, Kayle becomes Exalted and gains  8% bonus movement speed.

2.text: Level 6 - Arisen:  Kayle becomes  ranged and gains  350 bonus attack range, for a total of  525.

3.text: Level 11 - Aflame: While Exalted, Kayle  on-attack additionally launches a wave of fire forward, dealing 15 − 35 (based on  Starfire Spellblade's Rank) (+ 10% bonus AD) (+ 25% AP) magic damage to enemies it passes through. The wave is affected by  critical strike modifiers.

4.text: Level 16 - Transcendent: Kayle gains an additional  100 bonus attack range, for a total of  625. Additionally, the bonuses of Zealous are permanent now and no longer require to be stacked up.

0.text: Active: Kayle conjures a portal in front of her that faces the target direction. After a 0.25 second cast delay, a celestial sword launches forward from it.

1.text: The sword expands upon colliding with an enemy. Targets struck are dealt magic damage,  slowed for 2 seconds, and have their  armor and  magic resistance reduced by 15% for 4 seconds.

0.text: Active: Kayle and the target allied champion are  healed and gain bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.

1.text: If cast without a valid target, or self-cast, Celestial Blessing will automatically target the closest allied champion in range, prioritizing the one with the least amount of  health.

0.text: Passive: Kayle deals bonus magic damage  on-hit. The fire waves' from  Divine Ascent have equal base damage to this effect's base damage.

1.text: Active: Kayle kindles her blade, empowering her next basic attack within 6 seconds to have an  uncancelable windup and deal additional bonus magic damage  on-hit that is capped at 400 against  monsters. This effect also causes the attack to be  ranged with  525 range, even before ascending to  Arisen.

origin: 8 / 9 / 10 / 11 / 12% (+ 2% per 100 ap) of target's missing health

2.text: After ascending to  Aflame, Starfire Spellblade is upgraded, causing the basic attack to explode centered on the target, dealing its damage to all enemies within and applying  on-hit effects to them. This effect is a standard basic attack just in an area of effect and still affected by  critical strike modifiers.

3.text: Starfire Spellblade  resets Kayle's basic attack timer.

0.text: Active: Kayle grants herself or the target allied champion  invulnerability for a few seconds once the cast time begins, conjuring swords of holy fire, and highlighting a fixed area around the target.

1.text: Upon completing the cast time, the swords rain down, dealing magic damage to enemies in the highlighted area.

2.text: Divine Judgment will prioritize casting on allies over Kayle.
